author: protolambda
content: Data-gas is the proper term. And yes it increases/decreases by approximately 12.5% based on congestion, but not exactly; the mechanism behaves like EIP-1559 but is expressed in terms of total excess instead of a basefee. I think Ansgar configured it to approximate the same elasticity as that 12.5% from EIP-1559.

author: protolambda
content: You can read more about the gasprice update rule here: https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-4844#data-gasprice-update-rule (also explains how the 12.5% is approximated in EIP-4844)
